### Summary Table

```{r setup, include=False}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
data <- read_csv(file = 'desktop/android-games.csv')
list(data$title)
list(data$`total ratings`)
list(data$installs)
list(data$`growth (30 days)`)
list(data$`growth (60 days)`)

info <- summary(data)
summary_info <- list(info)
summary_info$num_observations <- nrow(data)
summary_table


```
